name: Codename: CORE
description:
TEST BUILD: This is far from complete and we are looking for feedback and thoughts! 

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/2RrHYyDt

CONTROLS:

  • AWSD/Joystick for movement.
  • H, J, K, L   /   Y, right trigger, A, B  /   X, A, B, right trigger for attack hotkeys:
    • H for blaster and J for ability skills, L for single-use skills, and K for Discarding. Hold H or J to do a charge attack.
    • Q to use ULT
  • Can also use the mouse: Left click for the base blaster, right-click for single-uses, and press the scroll wheel to use your ability card
  • I, O/ left bumper, right bumper to change the ability card mid-battle
  • K or E/Y/X to discard a single-use card
  • 1,2,3/d-pad to transform.
